elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Among the affirmations below, which are true and which are false? Si elles sont fausses, corrigez les affirmations.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Development of offers: When a company develops an offer for clients and potential clients, it must not necessarily ensure that it takes into account all of the client's needs and requirements.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Development of offers: When a company prepares an offer for clients and potential clients, it must ensure that it takes into account all of the client's needs and requirements.

elements.title: Conduit d'entretiens : The techniques for conducting effective meetings must be practiced and, above all, used regularly.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Among the affirmations below, which are true and which are false? Si elles sont fausses, corrigez les affirmations.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The identification of current difficulties is not a primary part of the analysis of needs and should be entrusted to the client.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Focusing on the specific difficulties that could derail the normal course of business is essential for analyzing the needs. The difficulties identified must be documented with precision in order to create a clear basis for possible solutions.
